data.name: Slap-It Together!
data.detailed_description:
Set in a game show that only cares for the numbers; you and up to 3 online friends slap, throw and whack your way through hordes of enemies and hand-painted environments in this comedic zombie wave-based fighter.

WELCOME TO THE SLAP-IT SHOW!

You have been forcefully selected to participate in the latest, greatest and most SLAPTASTICAL gameshow the world has seen! As a contestant, it's your job to entertain us! Fight off my increasingly growing horde of zombielike creations with your bare hands. Let's keep it kid-friendly, though! NO GUNS. Amuse my viewers and let's watch my fame increase, together.

YOU ARE NOT ALONE

You didn't think you were the only one, did you? Join your fellow contestants and enjoy a crazed battle with one another... Maybe I'll even pit you against each other at some point! What a lovely special event that'd be...

EXPERIENCE PICTURESQUE LOCATIONS AROUND MY WONDEROUS WORLD


There's plenty of sightseeing for everyone. I have to entertain you all at least a little bit, consider this my kind gift.. Although, I can't promise you won't find sneaky traps and tricks that I've personally placed for my amusement.

Hey! Where'd you get that!? THAT'S UNFAIR!

THESE. ARE. MY. GAMES.

Until I'm satisfied with your work, there is no chance you or your newly-found friends will be escaping my empire. After all, this world is my world. I am a God and you are a mere ant. Good luck, contestant. You'll most definitely need it! Especially considering I'll be personally ensuring your misery. MUHAHAHAHA!!

FEATURES


1-4 Players (Online Co-Op only)
Dynamic, Interactable Objects
Difficulty Scaling Based on Performance
4+ Levels with integrated lore
Tons of Customisation Options
Zombies
Unique Zombies
More Zombies
Even More Zombies
Whacky Combat
Made for casual AND hardcore players!

  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD: Radeon HD 7730 or Equivalent/ NVIDIA: GeForce GT 640 or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should work on most low-end laptops
